person.note: Yang(2) Yi(3) [7097] His ancestors were Huayin residents [source of the Hongnong jun Yang(2)]. During the Yongjia rebellion of the Jin dynasty, they moved their registers (zhanji) to Shangrao jun. During the rebellions of 760-1, a 6th generation ancestor moved to Fujian. During the following generations, the family used their wealth and power to control and maintain the community. Wei's [2031] elder brother (possibly cousin), uncle of his heir, Hong [2008] (Wei's son), Xie's [2003] uncle, Bangbi's [2021] 4th generation ancestor (through his nephew Hong ?), Zhang(1) Mian's [262] and Zu(1) Shiheng's [1716] brother-in-law, and Zhong(3) Jian's [552] teacher. Su Song, WJ, 51.1a; Du Dagui, 'xia,' 7.4a; Yang Yi, WJ, 11.17a-23b. CBD, 4, 3736-7.
